actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-822.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill S. 2222 to extend the time for commencing actions on behalf of an Indian tribe, band, or group, or on behalf of an individual Indian whose land is held in trust or restricted status.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of S. 2222 (Statute of limitations on certain Indian lands actions.)

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill S. 2222 to extend the time for commencing actions on behalf of an Indian tribe, band, or group, or on behalf of an individual Indian whose land is held in trust or restricted status.
